name: NRGball WorldZ Cup 3022
description:
Welcome to the NRGball WorldZ Cup 3022!

Created and Designed by nrgcore.com for GameJolt's World Cup Game Jam 2022, this game was built in about a week by one programmer and one artist using NRG - Realtime Application Development Environment.

The rules of the game are simple; beat the opposing team by scoring the most points in a quick round of five minutes to win the match.

Players cannot use their hands or feet to manipulate the ball; you are only allowed to use the official intergalactic-approved plasma gun provided by the League.

If you are not holding the ball, you can use your plasma gun to slow your opponent's movements. To grab or steal the NRGball simply get in close contact with it.

While carrying the ball you will be exposed and cannot use your plasma rounds. To score or pass the ball simply point and shoot.

During the match, powerups will randomly respawn allowing you to gain special abilities for a limited amount of time.

Beat the opposing team by scoring the most points in a quick round of five minutes to win the match.

Players cannot use hands or feet to manipulate the ball; however, you are allowed to use the official intergalactic-approved plasma gun provided by the League.

If you are not using the plasma gun to hold the ball, you can use it to slow your opponents' movements by shooting at them. To grab or steal the NRGball, simply get in close contact with it.

While carrying the ball you will be exposed and cannot use your plasma rounds. To score or pass the ball simply point and shoot.

During the match, powerups will randomly respawn allowing you to gain special abilities (rapid fire, speed, shield protection) for a limited amount of time.
